localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

** ONLY FOR PlayStation®Vita DEVICES **

The hugely popular smartphone app comes to PlayStation®Vita.

Key Features:

- Variety of birds to select
- Multiple levels of difficulty
- Highscore board
- 12 unlockable awards (birds, pipes, medals)
- Flag markers for 1st, 2nd and 3rd places in the levels
- Set lives on or off
- Enable or disable sounds
- Show or hide the game HUD
- Set touch or button controls
- Play in a horizontal or vertical view mode
- Exclusive extra Mode999 in this version of the game (enabled in settings)

Package size: 4505 KB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

Copyright (c) 2015 Simon Rybicki

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
